forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 24C. E winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 72F. E winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 24C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 73F. ESE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 20C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 68F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers and windy conditions developing in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers and windy conditions developing in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 19C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 66F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 20C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 66F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 20C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 67F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High near 20C. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 68F. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 51F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High near 20C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 68F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 11C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 51F. WNW winds shifting to ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 21C. NE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 69F. NE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
